rows.name: Crew/Seating
rows.description: Crew hits indicate that an exposed crew member has been hit, and the results are determined as in normal combat.

rows.name: Team
rows.description: Team hits indicate that an exposed horse has been hit, and the results are determined as in normal combat.

rows.name: Harness
rows.description: The shafts are shattered, the traces cut, or the team is separated from the vehicle in some other way. Treat this as an Out of Control vehicle mishap (page 28).

rows.name: Carrying Poles
rows.description: A chair or litter has one of the carrying poles broken, drops to the ground, and is immobilized.

rows.name: Wheel
rows.description: A wheel breaks or falls off, requiring repairs before the vehicle can proceed any further. A two-wheeled vehicle tips over, shedding its load and dumping any passengers on to the ground in a 1-yard fall.

rows.name: Cargo Area
rows.description: The attack hits the part of the vehicle where goods are stored, smashing a sizeable hole in the vehicle. Half the attackâ€™s Damage is also inflicted on a random item of cargo or passenger inside the vehicle.
